lyrics:
82 contributorstranslationstürkçeall i need lyricsverse 1
im the next act waiting in the wings
im an animal trapped in your hot car
i am all the days that you choose to ignore

chorus
you are all i need
youre all i need
im in the middle of your picture
lying in the reeds

verse 2
i am a moth who just wants to share your light
im just an insect trying to get out of the night
i only stick with you because there are no others

chorus
you are all i need
youre all i need
im in the middle of your picture
lying in the reeds

outro
its all wrong its all wrong its all wrong
its alright  its alright  its alright
its all wrong  its alright
its alright  its alrightyou might also like53embed
